article_title: Nelson Mandela's legacy extends to UGA campus
article_text:
Got some scoop for our reporters or editors? Click on the link below to send us your information.

article_metadata.author: Staff

og.description: Nelson Mandela, a South African anti-apartheid revolutionary who served as South Africa's first black president from 1994 to 1999, died Thursday, according to a press release from The Nelson Mandela
